response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This extraordinary item holds immense value for us, but considering its significance to you, we believe it would be a perfect match. We are offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $1,150,000. This is a unique opportunity to secure a piece that could potentially be worth even more in the future. I look forward to your consideration and hope to discuss the details further with you.", "product_price": 1150000}
